Package com.group13.tmae.service

Interface AthleteService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AthleteServiceImpl
public interface AthleteService
Service interface defining operations for managing athlete-related functionality.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void createAthlete​(Athlete athlete)
    Creates a new athlete.
    void deleteAthlete​(java.lang.Long id)
    Deletes an athlete by their unique identifier.
    org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Athlete> findPaginated​(int pageNo, int pageSize, java.lang.String sortField, java.lang.String sortDirection)
    Retrieves a paginated list of athletes, sorted based on specified criteria.
    java.util.List<Athlete> getAllAthletes()
    Retrieves a list of all athletes.
    Athlete getAthleteById​(java.lang.Long id)
    Retrieves an athlete by their unique identifier.
    void updateAthlete​(Athlete athlete)
    Updates an existing athlete.
    void updateAthletePhoto​(Athlete athlete)
    Updates the photo of an existing athlete.

  • Method Details

    • createAthlete

      void createAthlete​(Athlete athlete)
      Creates a new athlete.
      Parameters:
      athlete - The Athlete object to be created.

    • getAllAthletes

      java.util.List<Athlete> getAllAthletes()
      Retrieves a list of all athletes.
      Returns:
      List of Athlete objects.

    • getAthleteById

      Athlete getAthleteById​(java.lang.Long id)
      Retrieves an athlete by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the Athlete.
      Returns:
      The Athlete object with the specified ID, or null if not found.

    • updateAthlete

      void updateAthlete​(Athlete athlete)
      Updates an existing athlete.
      Parameters:
      athlete - The Athlete object to be updated.

    • updateAthletePhoto

      void updateAthletePhoto​(Athlete athlete)
      Updates the photo of an existing athlete.
      Parameters:
      athlete - The Athlete object whose photo is to be updated.

    • deleteAthlete

      void deleteAthlete​(java.lang.Long id)
      Deletes an athlete by their unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the Athlete to be deleted.

    • findPaginated

      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Athlete> findPaginated​(int pageNo, int pageSize, java.lang.String sortField, java.lang.String sortDirection)
      Retrieves a paginated list of athletes, sorted based on specified criteria.
      Parameters:
      pageNo - The page number to be retrieved.
      pageSize - The number of items per page.
      sortField - The field by which the results should be sorted.
      sortDirection - The sorting direction, either "asc" (ascending) or "desc" (descending).
      Returns:
      A Page object containing the paginated list of Athlete objects.
